title: Pool Party Jarvan IV
body: {{champion:59}} His q could be him thrusting out a pool noodle. His w can be he gets surrounded by a duck inner tube. His e can be he throws down a beach umbrella. And his r could be a kiddie pool. When he recalls he throws out an umbrella and he sits in his kiddie pool with an inner tube.

replies.body: More pool party dudes will always be a thing I'll support. :D
